title: Meta: Απέκλεισε τα κρατικά ρωσικά ΜΜΕ από τις πλατφόρμες της
cleaned_sentences: The US company Meta - on Facebook, Instagram and WhatsApp - announced yesterday, Monday, that it forbids Russian state media from accessing its platforms around the world in order to avoid any "foreign intervention" action.

The ban was announced a few days after US Secretary of State Anthony Blinken had denounced the destabilizing activities of the Russian media today (RT), which, as he had typically said, has turned into a "offshoot" of Russian information services.
"After careful thought we expanded our actions to the detriment of Russian state media.
Rossiya Segodnya, RT and other entities are now excluded from our platforms worldwide because of foreign intervention actions, "Meta said in a statement.

About 15 days ago, the US authorities presented a series of measures aimed primarily at Russian media, including criminal prosecutions and sanctions, in order to address attempts to intervene in the US elections for which they accuse Russia.
The RT, which began operating in 2005, is considered by the Western Kremlin propaganda instrument.
For its part, the network has ironically commented on US actions and has accused the US of preventing it from acting as a journalistic organization.
In a post on Telegram on Friday, Russian Foreign Ministry spokesman Maria Zaharova commented: "I believe that a new profession in the US should be created: a sanctions specialist against Russia."
With information from RES-EIA, AFP and Reuters
